title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: The promise and betrayal of Reconstruction, Lafayette’s revolutions, a day with Virginia Woolf, a poisoner’s reign of terror and more.
body:
Andrew Johnson cast himself as the ‘Moses’ of the formerly enslaved. His actions told a different story. Review by Randall Fuller
Read the review
The young aristocrat changed his motto to ‘Why Not?’ and set sail for America. Review by Mark G. Spencer
